titles.title: Deep and clear, the voice of instruction,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Deep and clear, the voice of instruction,
As you quietly cared for the sheep;
You would observe
Their peaceful estate
As they watched your tender eyes see ...

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
That they were looked after
As we are looked after:
Your mighty hand,
Your powerful arm,
Your shoulder to cry on,
A heart to give life ...
It’s this wonderful Father of mine!
It’s this wonderful Father of mine!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ruddy and Fair, with comely expression
As the prophet appointed your seat,
A calling to serve,
A kingdom to bless
As your children started to see ...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Calm and secure, in faith and devotion
As you trusted your God would defeat:
The giant was dead,
You cut off his head
As your people continued to see ...
